title: ADD_PED_DECORATION_FROM_HASHES
content:
0x70559AC7// AddPedDecorationFromHashes
void ADD_PED_DECORATION_FROM_HASHES(Ped ped, Hash collection, Hash overlay);Applies an Item from a PedDecorationCollection to a ped. These include tattoos and shirt decals.
collection - PedDecorationCollection filename hash
overlay - Item name hash
Example:
Entry inside "mpbeach_overlays.xml" -
<Item>
<uvPos x="0.500000" y="0.500000" />
<scale x="0.600000" y="0.500000" />
<rotation value="0.000000" />
<nameHash>FM_Hair_Fuzz</nameHash>
<txdHash>mp_hair_fuzz</txdHash>
<txtHash>mp_hair_fuzz</txtHash>
<zone>ZONE_HEAD</zone>
<type>TYPE_TATTOO</type>
<faction>FM</faction>
<garment>All</garment>
<gender>GENDER_DONTCARE</gender>
<award />
<awardLevel />
</Item>
Code:
PED::_0x5F5D1665E352A839(PLAYER::PLAYER_PED_ID(), MISC::GET_HASH_KEY("mpbeach_overlays"), MISC::GET_HASH_KEY("fm_hair_fuzz"))
This is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native ADD_PED_DECORATION_FROM_HASHES.Old name:  _APPLY_PED_OVERLAYOld name:  _SET_PED_DECORATION
codeBlocks:
// AddPedDecorationFromHashes
void ADD_PED_DECORATION_FROM_HASHES(Ped ped, Hash collection, Hash overlay);

Applies an Item from a PedDecorationCollection to a ped. These include tattoos and shirt decals.
collection - PedDecorationCollection filename hash
overlay - Item name hash
Example:
Entry inside "mpbeach_overlays.xml" -
<Item>
<uvPos x="0.500000" y="0.500000" />
<scale x="0.600000" y="0.500000" />
<rotation value="0.000000" />
<nameHash>FM_Hair_Fuzz</nameHash>
<txdHash>mp_hair_fuzz</txdHash>
<txtHash>mp_hair_fuzz</txtHash>
<zone>ZONE_HEAD</zone>
<type>TYPE_TATTOO</type>
<faction>FM</faction>
<garment>All</garment>
<gender>GENDER_DONTCARE</gender>
<award />
<awardLevel />
</Item>
Code:
PED::_0x5F5D1665E352A839(PLAYER::PLAYER_PED_ID(), MISC::GET_HASH_KEY("mpbeach_overlays"), MISC::GET_HASH_KEY("fm_hair_fuzz"))
